text:
Bert J. Harris Jr. (December 9, 1919 – May 19, 2019) was an American politician. He was born in Warwick, Georgia. Harris Jr. was a member of the Democratic Party. He was in the Florida House of Representatives from 1982 to 1996 for district 77.
Harris Jr. died on May 19, 2019 in Lake Placid, Florida at the age of 99.
